page.title: 03LOCAL FARMING
page.content: WEST FARM(Mr Edmondson)-30 hectares,3 fields grass,3 fields crops,2 tractors,10 cattle(meat)140 sheep, livery for 5 horses BALK WOOD FARM(Mr Fountain)-69 hectares,15 fields grass,3 fields crops,4 tractors,200 milkers,0 sheep. CLEAVES FARM(Mr Megginson)-30 hectares,10 fields grass,8 fields crops,6 tractors,0 cattle, 420 sheep. HOOD GRANGE(Mr Brown)-116 hectares,4 fields grass,8 fields crops,2 tractors,0 cattle 260 sheep. OSGODBY GRANGE(Mr Fawcett)-100 hectares,16 fields, 7 grass 7 crops, 4 tractors,50 cattle(meat) 340 sheep BALK WOOD(Mr Rymer)-40 hectares,9 fields grass,2 fields crops,5 tractors,102 milkers,0 sheep. MOUNT PLEASANT(Mr Swales)-40 hectares,2 fields grass,4 fields crops,2 tractors,o cattle, 0 sheep.
